name: Texas Method Weekly (5×5 Volume + 1×5 Intensity)
time_per_session_breakdown: Volume day: 5×5 (~15-20 min). Intensity day: ramp to 1×5 (~10 min).
overview_and_execution: Monday: 5×5 across at ~90% 5RM (volume). Wednesday: light recovery. Friday: ramp to new 5RM (intensity). Increase weight weekly if possible.
example_application: Week 1: Mon 5×5 @ 300 lb, Fri 1×5 @ 320 lb. Week 2: Mon 5×5 @ 300 lb, Fri 1×5 @ 325 lb.
important_notes: Intermediate approach bridging linear progression. Heavy volume day must not be to absolute failure; keep a rep in reserve.
volume_metrics: Volume day: 5×5 = 25 reps; Intensity day: 1×5 = 5 reps
